The Royalton Tower by Capitol Commons is an architecturally significant structure with no other building quite like it in Metro Manila. It is located in the heart of Pasig City, allowing you to wake up to the astonishing views of downtown Ortigas Center, Laguna de Bay and the Sierra Madre mountain range.
Standing 64 storeys high, this iconic residential masterpiece exudes both beauty and function. Designed to capture your eyes with its sinuous curves as if it floats and flows with the wind.
The curves of the tower are the balconies of every unit which allow fresh air to flow freely and also acts as a shade from the afternoon sun. 
Whether you choose to stay in a studio, a 1-bedroom, or a 2-bedroom unit, you will definitely get to experience all the unique facets of the tower.

The Royalton Capitol Commons 2BR For Rent condo is located on a high floor, facing Sierra Madre Mountain Range and Ortigas Center. Nestled in the heart of Pasig City, this iconic structure offers breathtaking views of the metro and mountains, providing an awe-inspiring sight to wake up to each day. The Royalton Capitol Commons stands as a true icon of both beauty and functionality, harmoniously blending architectural brilliance with the practical needs of modern living. Soaring 64 storeys high,  it is the 1st tower in the residential block of Capitol Commons, and has a low density with only 6-8 units per floor.
A striking feature of The Royalton Capitol Commons lies in its sinuous curves, creating a distinct visual allure as if it gracefully floats and harmoniously blends with the wind. These curves serve a dual purpose – not only do they mesmerize the eyes but also act as the balconies for every unit, facilitating the free flow of fresh air while providing a welcome shade from the afternoon sun.
It’s condo options cater to various preferences, whether you opt for a studio, a 1-bedroom, or a 2-bedroom unit. Regardless of your choice, each unit promises a unique experience, offering you the opportunity to immerse yourself fully in high-end living.

This Ortigas Office Space for Lease is fully renovated and ideal for BPO, Call Center or any corporate office. Located at The Orient Square, this towering structure on F. Ortigas Jr. Avenue is also called Emerald Avenue. With a floor area of 1,147 square meters per level, it boasts as the tallest building along this bustling main road.
Amenities:
The 6th floor houses its own food court and restaurant space. Just beyond the building, across Ruby Street, you’ll find a cluster of upscale, top-tier restaurants, bars, and fast-food chains.
Location:
The Orient Square sits prominently along F. Ortigas Jr. Avenue, previously called Emerald Avenue, nestled within the Ortigas Center business hub. Adjacent to Ruby Street, it’s strategically positioned among key office towers, residences, prominent hotels like Discovery Suites and Oakwood Premier, entertainment spots such as Metrowalk and El Pueblo de Manila, and an array of dining options within El Pueblo de Manila. Notably, it’s a stone’s throw away from major shopping complexes like The Podium, SM Megamall, St. Francis Square, Robinsons Galleria, and Shangri-La Plaza, alongside various significant landmarks.
Facing eastwards, the building’s primary facade overlooks F. Ortigas Jr. Avenue and Taipan Place, hosting the main lobby. The opposite side fronts Ruby Street to the west, catering to the basement parking access points.

Meticulously crafted by Wong Tung International Ltd. in collaboration with local architectural firm Recio + Casas Architects, this twin-tower residential condominium stands tall at 60 storeys, setting the standard for opulent living in Mandaluyong.

Opened for occupancy in 2009, The St. Francis Shangri-La Place is globally recognized as the first building to feature an advanced damping system, a technology also employed to fortify the iconic Millennium Bridge in London. As a result, it stands proudly as the safest building in the Philippines.

Immerse yourself in spacious interiors, abundant natural light from large windows, lofty ceilings, and individual balconies in every unit, creating a serene and inviting ambiance for residents. The property boasts a state-of-the-art clubhouse with top-tier amenities and exclusive hotel services, elevating the living experience for homeowners.

Experience the epitome of safety, luxury, and convenience at The St. Francis Shangri-La Place, strategically located at St. Francis St. cor. Internal Road, Brgy. Wack-Wack, Mandaluyong. Elevate your lifestyle with a residence that transcends expectations.

name: For Rent Commercial Office Space Located at Belvedere Tower, Pasig
description:
For Rent Commercial Offices Space Located at Belvedere Tower, Pasig
Office Unit
Floor Area: 192.82 Square Meters.

P 165k/month

Pasig City is a large district with a mix of offices and upscale housing, popular for mall complexes in and around the Ortigas Center area. Hip eateries serving modern Filipino fare cluster in Kapitolyo village, and parks like Greenfield District host weekend markets with local food and crafts. Cultural sites include the Pasig City Museum, exploring local history, and the stone Immaculate Conception Cathedral.

Located along the eastern border of Metro Manila with Rizal province, the city shares its name with the Pasig River. A formerly rural settlement, Pasig is primarily residential and industrial, but has been becoming increasingly commercial in recent years, particularly after the construction of the Ortigas Center business district in its west. The city is home to the Roman Catholic Diocese of Pasig, based in Pasig Cathedral, a landmark built around the same time as the town's foundation in 1573.

description: Experience luxurious living in this 1-bedroom condo unit at The Grove Pasig. The master bedroom boasts a king-sized bed frame, built-in cabinets, and stylish light fixtures. The kitchen features an induction range with an oven. Enjoy two balconies with unobstructed views, one in the living/dining area and the other in the master bedroom. This semi-furnished unit offers the perfect blend of comfort and style. The Grove Pasig provides a range of amenities, including swimming pools and a fitness center.

name: Tastefully designed 1BR at Residences at Westin Sonata Place For Lease
description:
Welcome to the luxurious Westin Residences at Sonata Place, where sophistication meets comfort and style. This immaculate 1-bedroom apartment boasts an impressive 77.57 square meters of living space, designed with the highest attention to detail and furnished to the highest standards.

The interior decor exudes elegance, with a spacious living area, floor-to-ceiling windows allowing natural light to flood in. The bedroom is equally impressive, with heavenly bed and plush bedding, ample storage space, powder room, and a pristine en-suite bathroom with high-quality fixtures and fittings.

Residents of this impressive building will benefit from unparalleled access to world-class amenities such as a fitness center, swimming pool, and exclusive lounge areas. The Westin Residences at Sonata Place offer the perfect combination of luxury and convenience, located in the heart of Ortigas Center, one of the Philippines’ most sought-after addresses.

This immaculate 1-bedroom apartment is move-in ready and fully furnished to the highest standards. Don’t miss your chance to experience the ultimate in comfort and luxury living.

name: 7,050 sq.m. Massive Warehouse for Lease in Pasig City, Metro Manila
description:
Are you looking for a spacious and strategically located warehouse for your business operations in Metro Manila? Look no further than our 6,000 sqm warehouse for lease in Pasig City!
This is a rare opportunity to find such a large warehouse space in the heart of the bustling metro area. With a covered floor area of 5,550 sqm and an additional 1,500 sqm for parking, this warehouse can accommodate all your storage or production needs.
What sets this warehouse apart is its cleverly designed layout, with only one aisle of beams in the middle, allowing for maximum optimization of space for your operations. The warehouse also boasts six loading bays for trucks, ensuring that your logistics needs are easily met.
Whether you need to store goods or manufacture products, this warehouse is equipped to handle your needs. It comes with a three-phase electrical supply, making it perfect for production and manufacturing purposes. In addition, there is a mezzanine area that can be used as an office space, providing a birds-eye view of the warehouse area and the loading docks through its numerous overlooking windows.
If you are looking for a spacious and strategically located warehouse in Metro Manila, then look no further than our 6,000 sqm warehouse for lease in Pasig City. Contact us today to schedule a viewing and take the first step towards expanding your business operations!

description: *** FOR CLIENTS ONLY *** Despite traffic, pollution and congestion, living in the city will always have its unique charm and appeal. name: 4 Bedroom House with Pool For Rent - Valle Verde 1, Pasig
description:
Check out this beautiful family home FOR RENT inside one of the exclusive subdivisions in Pasig City. Valle Verde 1 is a safe neighbourhood with 24-hour security and is conveniently located near Ortigas Central Business District. It offers 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a maids room, and a parking garage good for two vehicles and a pool in the back.
The Valle Verde residential subdivisions cover an area of 168 hectares in Pasig City. These were developed when the business and commercial communities were in place, in response to the housing needs of the growing population. In May 1974, the first Valle Verde Subdivision was opened for sale to the public. The subdivision was sold out on the same day. The next three phases were sold in less than two years’ time.
Valle Verde has its very own country club located right beside the Philippine Sports Complex which is more popularly known as ULTRA. The country club has its very own restaurant, swimming pool, tennis courts, badminton courts, as well as table tennis and squash courts.
NEARBY ESTABLISHMENTS:
• Valle Verde is just a 5 minute drive away from Ortigas Center, a prime business district and popular shopping destination
• Malls: SM Megamall, Robinsons Galleria, Shangri-la, Tiendesitas, Home Depot, Metrowalk, The Podium, EDSA Shangri-la Hotel, Eastwood City and Greenhills Shopping Center
• Hospital: The Medical City Hospital,
• Schools: St. Paul’s College, Brent International School, La Salle Greenhills, University of Asia and the Pacific, Poveda, and GCF International Christian School.
PROPERTY ATTRIBUTES:
• Lot Area: 520 sqm.
• Floor Area: 480 sqm.
• 4 Bedrooms
• 4 Bathrooms
• Den
• Semi Furnished (with A/Cs)
• Swimming Pool
• Garden
• 2 Car Garage
TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
• Lease Price: PhP 160,000 per month
• 12 months (1 years) minimum lease
• 12 months (1 year) advanced rental payment
• 2 months security deposit

name: 3 Bedroom House FOR RENT in Valle Verde 3, Ortigas, Pasig
description:
Looking for a secure and comfortable living space near Ortigas Center, look no further. Save time and energy in braving the horrendous traffic, but living in this comfortable, renovated home in Valle Verde 3. This split-level house offers 4 bedrooms with individual bathrooms, a den that can also be converted into an office.
Valle Verde 3 is a safe neighbourhood with 24-hour security and is conveniently located near Ortigas Central Business District.
VILLAGE AMENITIES:
• Gated community with round-the-clock security
• 6 residential phases covering 168 hectares
• Basketball court
• Valle Verde Country Club swimming pool, tennis court, restaurant, facilities for badminton, table tennis, squash
LOCATION AND NEARBY ESTABLISHMENTS:

• Shopping and dining: Tiendesitas, Metrowalk, SM Megamall, Robinsons Galleria, Shangri-La Plaza, The Podium, Greenhills Shopping Center, Eastwood City
• Hospital: The Medical City
• Schools: St. Paul’s College Pasig, Brent International School, La Salle Greenhills, University of Asia and the Pacific, St. Pedro Poveda College, GCF International Christian School

The use of glass facades allows for ample natural light and provides breathtaking views of the city skyline. Unit Quality:
I was highly satisfied with the quality of the units at Prisma Residences. The developers have paid attention to detail, using high-quality materials and finishes throughout. The units are spacious, well-ventilated, and designed to accommodate modern lifestyles. The floor plans are well-thought-out, offering functional and flexible living spaces. Facilities and Amenities:
Prisma Residences offers an extensive range of facilities and amenities for its residents. The development includes swimming pools, fitness centers, landscaped gardens, children's play areas, and multi-purpose function rooms. These amenities are well-maintained and provide residents with opportunities for recreation, relaxation, and socializing. The presence of 24-hour security and a dedicated property management team adds an extra layer of safety and convenience.

Community Atmosphere:
One of the highlights of living at Prisma Residences is the community atmosphere. The development fosters a sense of belonging and promotes interaction among residents. There are common areas and social spaces where residents can gather and engage in various activities. The community events and programs organized by the management team further enhance the sense of community and make living at Prisma Residences truly enjoyable.

Developer Reputation:

name: 4 Bedroom House for Rent - Valle Verde 5, Ortigas, Pasig
description: This cozy house FOR RENT in Valle Verde 5 is definitely an ideal home for those looking for a safe neighbourhood with 24-hour security and conveniently located near Ortigas Central Business District. It offers 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a den, a maids room, and a parking garage good for two vehicles.The Valle Verde residential subdivisions cover an area of 168 hectares in Pasig City. These were developed when the business and commercial communities were in place, in response to the housing needs of the growing population. In May 1974, the first Valle Verde Subdivision was opened for sale to the public. The subdivision was sold out on the same day. The next three phases were sold in less than two years’ time.Valle Verde has its very own country club located right beside the Philippine Sports Complex which is more popularly known as ULTRA. The country club has its very own restaurant, swimming pool, tennis courts, badminton courts, as well as table tennis and squash courts.NEARBY ESTABLISHMENTS:• Valle Verde is just a 5 minute drive away from Ortigas Center, a prime business district and popular shopping destination• Malls: SM Megamall, Robinsons Galleria, Shangri-la, Tiendesitas, Home Depot, Metrowalk, The Podium, EDSA Shangri-la Hotel, Eastwood City and Greenhills Shopping Center• Hospital: The Medical City Hospital,• Schools: St. Paul’s College, Brent International School, La Salle Greenhills, University of Asia and the Pacific, Poveda, and GCF International Christian School.PROPERTY ATTRIBUTES:• Lot Area: 450 sqm.• Floor Area: 410 sqm.• 4 Bedrooms with bathrooms• Den• Semi FurnishedTERMS AND CONDITIONS:• Lease Price: PhP 140,000 per month• 12 months (1 years) minimum lease• 12 months (1 year) advanced rental payment• 2 months security deposit

name: Grand Emerald Tower -- Furnished 3BR Unit for Rent near Robinsons Ortigas Mall
description:
Live, work, play, and love. Grand Emerald Tower incorporates all four seamlessly.

This residential condominium is your home away from home—a master planned project designed to meet the needs and lifestyle of the modern city dweller.

Providing spacious units that fit any number of households, this stunning edifice is the ideal choice for those who desire a residence that boasts of a cozy abode, a coveted lifestyle, and a well desired location.

Grand Emerald Tower features amenities that make life finer and more exciting than expected. Provided are a swimming pool, saunas for men and women, a children’s play area, and a function room.

At the rooftop is a viewing deck where one can take pleasure in the majestic view of the city skyline.
Residents of Grand Emerald Tower are ensured a convenient lifestyle, as a cozy coffee shop, Korean grocery, food shops, and service centers are a few steps away.

Well located, the building is a stone’s throw away from major malls, schools, and offices.
